name: ZombieVillage Level 1 Demo Part 1
description:
Playable level 1 part 1 for testing our new rpg adventure game in an early stage. Please after download this part ( ZombieVillage.exe and ZombieVillage-1a.bin ) then download part 2 ( ZombieVillage-1b.bin ) and part 3 ( ZombieVillage-1c.bin ), put them in the same folder and run ZombieVillage.exe to setup.

#rpg #adventure #rpgadventure 

Please share your experiences with us at info@bulukod.com so that we can improve the game.
